channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Magee Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Magee Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-4783|2024-08-02T07:38:00.700Z -- unknown -- magee%20shortcodes
item.description: The Magee Shortcodes WordPress plugin through 2.1.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
